hobbies.name: Painting
hobbies.description: I have been painting since I was four years old. My family bonded over our mutual love for art

hobbies.name: Reading
hobbies.description: I love reading. I read a lot of fiction and non-fiction. I also love reading about history and politics

hobbies.name: Singing
hobbies.description: I love singing. I have been singing since I was a child. I have been a part of my school choir and have performed at various events

hobbies.name: Dancing
hobbies.description: I took dancing classes for 5 years. I have performed at various events and have won many competitions
